summary: The module constructs and manages prompts for an execution engine that leverages a language model to translate natural language instructions into concrete operations across filesystem, RESTful, and SQL domains. It handles credential insertion, formats commands for both forward and reverse execution, and interfaces with the OpenAI API to obtain generated commands.
